net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.action

Interface UiHandlerActionSubmit

  • All Superinterfaces:
    UiHandler, UiHandlerAction

    public interface UiHandlerActionSubmit
extends UiHandlerAction
    This is the UiHandlerAction for the action submit.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    UiHandlerActionConfirm

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSubmit(UiEvent event)
      This method is invoked for the action submit.

    • Method Detail

      • onSubmit

        void onSubmit(UiEvent event)
        This method is invoked for the action submit. This means that some step or change is completed and shall be submitted. This is more generic than e.g. save or approve.
        Parameters:
        event - is the UiEvent that triggered this action.
